title: S8E10 – "Not What It Looks Like" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Brandon Faircloth, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about grisly games, demonic doorways, vicious visitors, and malevolent machines.
